# The `ExtraPassManager.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides a pass manager that only runs its passes if the provided marker analysis has been preserved, together with a class to define such a marker analysis. <a href="#details">More...</a>

</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file provides a pass manager that only runs its passes if the provided marker analysis has been preserved, together with a class to define such a marker analysis.
